ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Happy Happy Joy Joy
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My first one I did the same thing only to learn from a bard who had already done the quest that you can give her Plat instead of gold. She sure sounds
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Kenneth E. Bachman" <kbachman@...> wrote:
> Cheryl Kiraly wrote:
>
> > So after I hit Eurdin for my songs it was off for
> the Lambents. I realised
> > when I got to the temple it said 550gp. I had
> everything in PP *DOH* So
> > back to the bank I went and back again. Finally
> at about 10:45 last night I
> > ended up with my first piece of lambents!
>
> It's my understanding that she lies, and pp is fine.
> Of course, I was too chicken to risk it, and did
> the
> same thing you did.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk
>
--------------------------

My first one I did the same thing only to learn from a
bard who had already done the quest that you can give
her Plat instead of gold. She sure sounds specific
doesn't she? Well, for my second one, I gave her plat
instead of gold and got my second bracer. So she does
accept plat instead of gold.

-Sing
